name: Spotlight - People & Project Manager
overview:
Spotlight is a web and mobile app to manage employees who work remotely.

Built upon a lean task management system, Spotlight differs from other task management tools because it focuses on people. Spotlight is the innovative creation of Vincent Serpico, who has built several task management systems from the ground up and has managed numerous remote teams. Built out of necessity for his near-shore development company, serpicodev.com, Spotlight is a real-world tool built and used by folks who develop software and work remotely every day.

Spotlight brings remote teams together in an interactive, social-centric UI. Leveraging familiar social tenants, such as short tweets and wall posts, Spotlight facilitates communication among team members in a fun and engaging way. Project managers, scrum masters and team leads can quickly and easily digest real-time status and availability updates from their whole team… on the web or on the go via the mobile app. Clients love Spotlight because it gives them a quick and easy way to assess the progress of their project at any time via consolidated project statistics and daily scrum updates.

Check out Spotlight today at http://www.spotlightppm.com, and see why everyone agrees, “Spotlight is the best app to manage remote teams”.
